name: Aryan
summary: Automation Engineer with 2+ years of experience in the automotive domain, specializing in AI-driven automation, defect management, and infotainment debugging. Skilled in Python, C++, and Embedded C with expertise in AI/ML frameworks like PyTorch and TensorFlow.

details: Performed root cause analysis of infotainment stability issues in AUTOSAR Node0, diagnosing memory leaks, watchdog resets, and task overruns at the BSW/OS layer.
Automated repetitive workflows using Python scripting, improving debugging efficiency.
Developed Fishbone-based root cause analysis functionality for defect diagnosis.
Built an AI automation for duplicate Jira defect detection using Sentence-BERT and cosine similarity, reducing redundancy.
Developed responsive web apps using React.js and Tailwind CSS.
Integrated REST APIs into dashboards for real-time data visualization.

education.degree: B.Tech in Electronics and Communication Engineering

projects.name: Multi-Document Summarization & Comparison Tool
projects.description: Built a text summarization and comparison tool using transformer-based NLP models to analyze multiple documents and detect semantic overlap.

projects.name: AI-Powered Jira Duplicate Detection
projects.description: Developed a machine learning pipeline to detect duplicate Jira tickets using embeddings and cosine similarity.
